low-location-accuracy: Location accuracy is insufficient. Please enable GPS and try again
location-not-determined-check-settings: Could not determine your location. Please make sure you have enabled access in your device settings.
payment-error: An error occurred during payment. Please try again.
the-session-has-timed-out-please-log-in: Session has timed out. Please log in.
network-connection-lost: Internet connection issues. Please try again later.

api.server-error: Server issues. Please try again later.

critical.critical-error-occurred: The application encountered a critical error and needs to be restarted
critical.close-app-ios-instruction: Double-click the Home button and swipe the application up to close
critical.manual-report-message: Please send the error report to:
critical.error-boundary-message: We've recorded this error and are working on fixing it

validations.password: The password length must be at least 6 characters.
